remarks: The Axiom of Pairing using class variables.  Theorem 7.13 of [Quine] p. 51.  By virtue of its definition, an unordered pair remains a set (even though no longer a pair) even when its components are proper classes (see ~ prprc ), so we can dispense with hypotheses requiring them to be sets.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-1993.)
